name: The Server 2 Retribution (Agame's)
description:
The second part of the game "The Server" will tell you that the player will have to return to the already destroyed building and pick up the documents that he forgot. But he will fall into a big trap!

Game Control:

W A S D - Move Player

E - Skip Scene

F - Flashlight and Interaction with objects

Ctrl - Sit Down
